CustomField.formula: IF( OR ( INCLUDES ( BU__c, "AMPE"), INCLUDES (BU__c,"AMPE-Core") ), "AMPE" , IF( INCLUDES (BU__c, "Healthcare Strategic Growth"), "HCSG" , IF( INCLUDES (BU__c, "Healthcare Royalty and Income"), "HCRI", IF( INCLUDES (BU__c, "NGT"), "NGT","AMPE"))))
CustomField.label: Coversheet (Reporting)
